jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Assisting Legal Manager
● Drafting and reviewing a various range of contract within the designated Gojek product or digital marketing activities
● Providing day-to-day legal support for cross-functional department, including support associated with business process improvement, operational matters, and international expansion of the products
● Working closely and coordinating with the business team in Gojek and external legal counsel appointed by Gojek Group as required
● Giving continued support on the creation, standardization and implementation of Gojek Group legal compliance, policies, terms & conditions, internal working procedures and standard operational guidelines

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Bachelor of Law from a reputable law school in Indonesia
  • Minimum 2 year of experience in private practice at top-tier law firms, or minimum 3 years of relevant professional experience as in-house legal of multinational companies
  • Significant experience in drafting, and negotiating legal documents both in English and Indonesian
  • Excellent drafting skills
  • Good legal knowledge for corporate law and analytical interpretation of business structure (both technical and operational aspects)
  • Highly proficient in spoken and written English
  • Ability to adapt, work as a team and willingness to work in fast-paced team environment
  • Excellent communication and social competence skills
  • Strong interest in Tech industry and Digital Marketing
